ReceivedDocumentType.name: ReceivedDocumentType
ReceivedDocumentType.description: Represents a junction object between Received Document and Document Type.

DocumentTypeId.description: The ID of the document type for the document checklist item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the received document type.

PageNumber.description: Page number of the received document.

ReceivedDocumentId.description: The ID of the received document for the received document type.
